comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.202 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I have my system locale set to Swedish but my user locale to English. So I want English text. However it looks like intl.locale.matchOS uses the system locale so I get some things in Swedish.

For more information please look at this Zotero forum discussion:
http://forums.zotero.org/discussion/19925?page=1#Item_9

(I have no information about the version, please ask in the thread above.)


Actual results:

I got some text in the Zotero plugin in Swedish.


Expected results:

It should have been in English
